text: Thomas Bowyer may refer to: *Sir Thomas Bowyer, 1st Baronet (1586-1650), English politician *Thomas Bowyer (died 1595), MP for Midhurst (UK Parliament constituency) *Sir Thomas Bowyer, 2nd Baronet (1609-1659) of the Bowyer baronets *Thomas Bowyer (martyr) (died 1556), one of the Stratford Martyrs during the Marian persecutions *Tommy Bowyer (footballer) (1902–?), English footballer ==See also== *Bowyer (surname)
title: Thomas Bowyer
